TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 924-925
TEI.2.document_title: D W Anthony to Stephen F Austin, 02-04-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: D. W. Anthony to Austin, February 4, 1833. Concerning land for Patrick Green.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 924-925

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*D. W. Anthony to Austin, February 4, 1833. Concerning land for Patrick Green.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="02-04-1833">Feby 4. 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Col*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. Patrick Green*/person_mentioned*, who you will recollect has been in the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned* four or five years, and thro' ignorance and poverty has failed to procure a better location of land than can now be made, appealed to me to assist him in getting him a donation, and in clearing it out of the *location_mentioned*office*/location_mentioned*. I therefore entered his name on *location_mentioned*a league next to *person_mentioned*Grayson*/person_mentioned*s on the Caronkoway*/location_mentioned*, which he now visits *location_mentioned*San Felipe */location_mentioned*to obtain a title to. I promised also to furnish him with the means of payment which I had with me when I was in *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* last, for that purpose; but am at this time without. You will please have the goodness to let this form no obstruction to the issuing of the title, as I have assured*person_mentioned* Mr. G------*/person_mentioned*it should not, and I will forward the money in two or three weeks, or make payment when I shall be in *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* in the course of the month. I will send you the Spanish Copy of the remonstrance next week, as correctly printed as we have the means of doing, for I am afraid it will not do to wait longer for corrections—without losing much of the effect its circulation will have.*/p*
*p*Let me hear from you as to the present aspect of our political arrangements.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*D. W. Anthony*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
